en.title: Summarize Text with AI
en.inputHint: Tip: Works best with articles, documents, or long texts

seo.whatIsContent: **AI Text Summarization** uses **Chrome's local Summarizer API** or **Google Gemini** to condense long texts into concise summaries. Extract key points from articles, documents, and reports automatically.
seo.howToTitle: How to summarize text with AI?
howToSteps: Select **summary length**: Short, Medium, or Long

faq.question: Is text summarization free?
faq.answer: Yes! It uses **Chrome's local Summarizer API** (free, offline) when available, or falls back to **Google Gemini** (requires free API key).

faq.question: How long can the text be?
faq.answer: Works best with texts between **500-10,000 words**. Longer texts may be truncated or require multiple summaries.

faq.question: Does it work offline?
faq.answer: Yes! When using **Chrome's Summarizer API**, it works **completely offline** with no internet connection needed.
